meanings.definition: Operates beyond the necessary or desired level.
meanings.sent1: The machine was overoperates, causing it to break down.
meanings.sent2: The overoperates device consumed more power than expected.
meanings.sent3: The overoperates clock ticked so loudly, it woke up the entire house.
meanings.sent4: Her overoperates enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The overoperates engine roared with power.

meanings.definition: To function excessively or excessively well.
meanings.sent1: He tends to overoperates when trying to impress others.
meanings.sent2: The new software overoperates, making tasks easier to complete.
meanings.sent3: The coffee machine overoperates every morning, brewing too much coffee.
meanings.sent4: The team overoperates during crunch time, delivering exceptional results.
meanings.sent5: The car engine overoperates smoothly, never missing a beat.
